definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. [[בָּֽגְדָה]] Je 3:20 + 14 t.; Impf. [[יִבְגּׁד]] Mal 2:15 + 5 t.; [[נִבְגַּד]] Mal 2:10; Inf. abs. [[בָּגוֹד]] Is 48:8, Je 5:11; cstr. [[בְּגׁד]] Is 33:1; [[בִּגְדוֹ]] Ex 21:8; Pt. [[בּׂגֵד]] Pr 22:12 + 11 t.; [[בּוֹגֵד]] Is 33:1 + 10 t.;—act or deal treacherously, faithlessly, deceitfully, in the marriage relation, in matters of property or right, in covenants, in word and in general conduct.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: abs. 1Sa 14:33, Job 6:15, Ps 78:57, Is 24:16, Is 33:1, Is 33:1, Is 48:8, Mal 2:11. Cf. phrases [[אחי בגדו כמו נחל]] my brethren have dealt deceitfully as a brook Job 6:15; [[בּׂגְדִים בָּנׇ֑דוּ וּבֶגֶד בּוֹגְדִים]] [[בָּגׇ֑דוּ]] the treacherous have dealt treacherously, yea in treachery have the treacherous dealt treacherously Is 24:16 (striking alliteration); [[בּׂגְדֵי אָוֶן]] treacherous in wickedness Ps 59:6.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: c. [[מִן]] pregnant, [[בָּֽגְדָה אִשָּׁה מֵרֵעָהּ]] acteth treacherously (in departing) from her friend Je 3:20. The ptcp. is used Pr 2:22 + 8 t., Ps 25:3, Ps 59:6, Ps 119:158, Is 21:2, Is 24:16, Is 24:16, Is 33:1, Je 3:8, Je 3:11, Je 9:1, Hb Hab 1:13, Hab 2:5; [[בּׂגְדֵי בָָגֶד]] dealers treacherously in treachery (very treacherously) Je 12:1.
